verbs.description: Kudlow , the director of the National Economic Council , [V: had] joined Trump last week in Canada for what became a contentious meeting of the Group of Seven world leaders .

[ARG0: Kudlow , the director of the National Economic Council ,] had [V: joined] [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: last week] [ARGM-LOC: in Canada] [ARGM-PRP: for what became a contentious meeting of the Group of Seven world leaders] .
Kudlow , the director of the National Economic Council , had joined Trump last week in Canada for [ARG1: what] [V: became] [ARG2: a contentious meeting of the Group of Seven world leaders] .
